title: Rachel Reeves – 2021 Comments on Conservative MPs Voting Against Full Greensill Inquiry
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Rachel Reeves, the Shadow Chancellor of the Duchy of Lancaster, on 14 April 2021.
content:
Boris Johnson’s MPs have voted to cover up cronyism.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners

It’s the return of Tory sleaze: one rule for them, another for everybody else.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners

Labour will keep standing up for the British people so we can end this culture of Conservative cronyism.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
